leitej.thread

Class XAgnosticThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • leitej.thread.AgnosticThread
        • leitej.thread.XAgnosticThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class XAgnosticThread
extends AgnosticThread
    eXtended Agnostic Thread

    The class XAgnosticThread extends AgnosticThread to achieve an invocation by appointment.

    Author:
    Julio Leite
    See Also:
    Thread, AgnosticThread, XThreadData, ThreadData, InvokeItf
